verses.roman:
tabe gauḍa-deśe āilā kālā-kṛṣṇadāsa
navadvīpe gela teṅha śacī-āi-pāśa

synonyms: tabe—then; gauḍa-deśe—to Bengal; āilā—came; kālā-kṛṣṇadāsa—Kālā Kṛṣṇadāsa; navadvīpe—to Navadvīpa; gela—went; teṅha—he; śacī-āi-pāśa—before mother Śacī.
translation: Thus Kālā Kṛṣṇadāsa went to Bengal, and he first went to Navadvīpa to see mother Śacī.
